Package org.fcrepo.server.search

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FieldSearch
    Provides a simple field-based search service across all objects in the repository.
    FieldSearchResult  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Condition  
    FieldSearchQuery  
    FieldSearchResultSQLImpl
    A FieldSearchResults object returned as the result of a FieldSearchSQLImpl search.
    FieldSearchSQLImpl
    A FieldSearch implementation that uses a relational database as a backend.
    FieldSearchSQLModule
    Module that wraps FieldSearchSQLImpl.
    ObjectFields  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Operator
    The Operators that can be used in a FieldSearchQuery.
